about_the_game:
Welcome to "Run Away" - Where Chaos Meets Creativity!
.
Embark on a whimsical adventure in this hilarious indie game that combines platform building, portal collecting, and a dash of bull-dodging madness! Get ready to unleash your inner builder, quick-thinker, and fearless dodger as you navigate through the wacky world of "Run Away."

Key Features


🏗️ Build Your Way to Victory:
Construct Block platforms on-the-fly to reach those elusive high portals. The higher the portal, the bigger the challenge! Show off your building prowess as you outsmart your opponents.

🐢🐰🎅👨‍🦲 Choose Your Comical Character:
Play as a charming cast of characters, each with their own unique quirks. Will you be the nimble Bunny, the resilient Turtle, the festive Santa, or the bold and bald Man? The choice is yours!
.

🐂 Dodge and Weave in the Bullfighting Arena:
Survive the chaos as ferocious bulls charge through the arena! Stay on your toes, strategize your moves, and avoid becoming bull bait. It's a test of agility and wit!

🌐 Collect Portals, Conquer Challenges:
Explore a variety of whimsical levels filled with mind-bending portals. Collect as many as you can while navigating through imaginative landscapes. Each portal is a new adventure waiting to unfold!

🎮 Multiplayer Mayhem

Challenge your friends or team up for chaotic multiplayer fun. Who can build the craziest structure, collect the most portals, and dodge the bulls with style? Prove your skills in the ultimate showdown!

🤣 Laugh-Out-Loud Cartoony Graphics:
Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world filled with comical characters, vibrant landscapes, and hilarious animations. "Run Away" is not just a game; it's a laughter-filled journey!

🏆 Compete For Glory

Climb the leaderboards and earn bragging rights as the ultimate portal-collecting, platform-building, bull-dodging champion. Are you up for the challenge?

Get ready to Run Away - Where every escape is a masterpiece of chaos and creativity!

name: Run Away

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: 🎮 Run Away: Build, Dodge, Collect! 🌈 Dive into the zany world of "Run Away," where block platforms, portal-hopping, and bull-dodging collide! Choose from adorable characters, build your way to victory, and face off against charging bulls. Ready for a hilarious adventure? Let the chaos begin!
